column1: 2250|10.50 P. M.|10.50 P. M. This diary-keeping of mine is
column3: the outcome of that scientific habit of mind about which I wrote this morning. I like to register impressions while they are fresh.

column1: 2250|ten to eleven|Saturday night. And I said
column5: "Pub is. Coach is. Look at the clock." Jack said

column1: 2250|22.50|So think yourself lucky while you're awake and remember a happy crew. Think of Hamburg on the Magic Night. 22.50 and they went out neatly
column2: just as they should - you couldn't fault Parks
column3: he was always on his route.
